### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16839](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16839.html) (Replace Connman and BanMan globals with Nod
ACK afc14ec. Alternatively you could just pull in the main README. That would lose the navigation section at the bottom, but that's redundant with the menu bar at the top anyway.
Good suggestion. However the existing README talks more about development process.\n\nUnless you mean doc/README.md? That one is way richer but still slightly off-topic.
